name: don't disappear
description:
A game made for the 40 Hours Game Jam (theme: 10 Seconds). Made by:

  • Programmer - Me (Steven Upton)
  • Artist and Animator - Tom Gill
  • Music - Royalty free/free to use music by DL Sounds (https://www.dl-sounds.com/)

Control a stick man and avoid being submerged by the white areas. Every ten seconds, the environment's color will invert, so make sure you reach a safe spot in time.

Press escape to exit the game.
